SEARCH
Package com.kneelawk.graphlib.api.graph

Interface GraphUniverse

@NonExtendable public interface GraphUniverse
Represents one GraphWorld per ServerLevel. Provides access to each world's associated GraphWorld.

Note: GraphUniverses must be registered with the register() method in order to work properly.

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested Classes
    Modifier and Type
    Interface
    Description
    static interface 
    GraphUniverse.Builder
    A builder for GraphUniverses.

    • addNodeType

      void addNodeType(@NotNull @NotNull BlockNodeType type)
      Registers a BlockNodeType.

      The identifier under which the decoder is registered corresponds to the one returned by the associated block node's BlockNode.getType().

      Parameters:
      type - the block node type to register.

    • addNodeTypes

      Parameters:

      Returns:
      all cache categories currently registered.

    • register

      void register()
      Registers this graph universe so that it can be found by its id.

      If a graph universe is not registered, it will not work.

    • getNodeTypeIndex

      int getNodeTypeIndex(@NotNull @NotNull net.minecraft.resources.ResourceLocation typeId)
      Gets the registration index of the given block node type id.

      This is currently used in the debug renderer for determining a node's color.

      Note: this should not be used for synchronization, as this is mod load order dependant, which may not be the same on the client as on the server.

      Parameters:
      typeId - the type id of the block node to get the registration index of.
      Returns:
      the registration index of the given block node type id.

    • getNodeTypeCount

      int getNodeTypeCount()
      Gets the number of block node type ids currently registered.
      Returns:
      the number of block node type ids currently registered.

    • builder

      @Contract(value="-> new", pure=true) @NotNull static @NotNull GraphUniverse.Builder builder()
      Creates a new GraphUniverse builder.
      Returns:
      a new builder for building a GraphUniverse.
